basics.name: Brandon Nelson
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.A. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2025.

volunteer.summary: Participate in traditional Hawaiian taro cultivation and sustainable agricultural practices.
highlights: Learned traditional water management systems integral to the ahupua’a
Participated in educational activities about the anatomy of kalo plants and Hawaiian farming techniques

awards.title: University of Hawai'i at Manoa Dean's List
awards.summary: Undergraduate student earned a semester GPA of 3.5 or higher based on 12 credits that did not receive grades of no credit, withdrawn, incomplete, failure.
